info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued October 02 at 8:18PM CDT until October 02 at 9:15PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM CDT FOR WESTERN TEXAS...CIMARRON...WESTERN SHERMAN AND DALLAM COUNTIES... At 818 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Griggs, or 9 miles north of Stratford, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to roofs, siding, and trees is possible. Locations impacted include... Stratford, Boise City, Texline, Keyes, Eva, Kenton, Wheeless, Black Mesa Park, Felt, Conlen, Griggs, and Sturgis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
